name: Tumblr - April Fools 2015 Company Names
description:
• Turns your blog into a company.
  • Brings back the ExecutiveSuite 2015 April fools' day joke.
  • Randomizes company names!

user.name: Sorcerer
user.about:
I just like to change how the web looks.
You're free to modify my styles, just attribute me.
Please email me if any of my styles are broken/out of date so I can fix them.

additional_info:
• 19 different company suffixes
  • On ~50% of posts
  • Lighter suffix, for readability
  • Randomized using (many) nth-child selectors
